int MaxIndex
<summary> maxindex are indexes of the maxdate </summary>

int MinIndex
<summary> minindex are indexes of the mindate </summary>

DateMinMaxNewOld ( IEnumerable< DateTime?> timelist)
<summary> Takes a list of datetimes(which came from a list of files) and calculates the newest and oldest dates and stores the indexes too. Constructor for the class. Also does all the work. </summary>

simplesect.para: Class: given a list of DateTime?s, get oldest and newest date and the index of each This is for the "Source time from" option - it looks at an entire subfolder of files.
